title: Don Quixote: Kitri's wedding
brief_description: The American Ballet Theatre’s production of Don Quixote: Kitri’s Wedding at the Metropolitan Opera House in New York. Stars Mikhail Baryshnikov and Cynthia Harvey with choreography by Baryshnikov.
